item.title: CVE-2024-29927|2024-08-02T14:29:34.701Z -- hastheme -- wishsuite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasTheme WishSuite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WishSuite: from n/a through 1.3.7.
